author: smartprogrammer
content: We have already started testing dropping premerge history on Sepolia. We were able to sync all CL nodes without problems. Though, Prysm and Lighthouse were still asking for logs of a deposit contract premerge. But this was confirmed by the teams to be a cosmetic thing and they dont realy rely on it to fully sync. This was all done by our QA Engineer Colleague <@436137413686067210> . Feel free to ask him any questions

author: parithosh
content: And just to confirm, snap and full sync worked?

content: I only tested snap syncing the node.
